alert.note: Alert for Giles (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 29 at 6:24PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Giles County through 700 PM EDT... At 622 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm over Thessalia, or near Poplar Hill, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pearisburg... Narrows... Pembroke... Mountain Lake... Poplar Hill... Kire... and Eggleston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Occasional cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Additional statements will be issued as conditions warrant.
